00011 #include "ndsScan.h"

00017 uint8_t *ndsScan(uint8_t degrees) {
00018 
00019         uint8_t winkel = 0;
00020         static uint8_t points[180] = {};
00021 
00022         for(winkel = 0; winkel < 180; winkel = winkel + degrees){
00023 
00024                 nds3_move(winkel);
00025 
00026                 //saving time for the movement of the servoengine, more for the first move
00027                 if(winkel == 0){
00028                         delay(500);
00029                 }else {
00030                         delay(100);
00031                 }
00032 
00033                 //updating the coprozessor, for the realtime value of the sensor
00034                 copro_update();
00035                 points[winkel / degrees] = nds3_get_dist();
00036         }
00037 
00038         ndsScan_init(90);
00039         return points;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void ndsScan_init(){
00043         i2c_init();
00044         nds3_move(90);
00045 }
